text: (jis kee bakhshis nahin) aur hamane insaan ko jise usakee maan ne dukh par dukh sah ke pet mein rakha (isake alaava) do baras mein (jaake) usakee doodh badhaee kee (apane aur) usake maan baap ke baare mein taaqeed kee ki mera bhee shukriya ada karo aur apane vaaladain ka (bhee) aur aakhir sabako meree taraph laut kar jaana hai
